Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Bettoja Atlantico Hotel places you in the heart of Rome, walking distance from Palazzo Massimo alle Terme and Teatro dell'Opera di Roma. This 4-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 69 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature separate bathtubs and showers, complimentary toiletries, and bidets. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and complimentary use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Santa Prassede - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
National Museum of Oriental Art - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palace of Expositions - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Vittorio Emanuele II - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Baths of Trajan - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Colle Oppio Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.6 km / 8.4 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 23.6 km / 14.6 mi

The preferred airport for Bettoja Atlantico Hotel is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
